Key Arguments: The legislation will erode freedom of speech, which is fundamental to a free and fair society.
Freedom of speech is crucial for the discovery of truth through the free flow of information.
The government should not be the arbiter of truth as it is subjective and influenced by individual worldviews.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of speech is the bedrock of a free and fair society.
Setting up the government as the arbiter of truth is not the answer as the government is made up of people whose ideas of truth are subjective to their worldview.
